column5: Hi all,  This July my brother is getting married in Kingston. So naturally I thought maybe I would bring the boat and possibly slide a little muskie fishing into my down time. I'm not in the party(thank you son!), so I should be able to arrange for a day on the water.  I'm looking for any tips for a July Muskie day, locations, hot spots, trolling, casting, Launches (with parking).  Or if Kingston isn't the best place to get on the water, possibly a neighbouring town?  Thanks !  Chris
Get to the st lawrence.... Gananoque has some giants...
hah, silly me, I was thinking Kingston was east of Gananoque. It's been a few years since I've been out that way. never on the water.
